meanings.sent1: The optometrists checked my eyes for glasses.
meanings.sent2: Many optometrists work in eye clinics.
meanings.sent3: Why did the optometrists always have a clear vision of the future?
meanings.sent4: The optometrists were like detectives, searching for clues in my eyes.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the friendly smiles of the optometrists during my eye exam.

meanings.sent1: We visited two optometrists for our eye check-ups.
meanings.sent2: The optometrists' office was busy with patients.
meanings.sent3: The optometrists gathered for a group photo, each wearing stylish glasses.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of optometrists, she stood out with her unique approach.
meanings.sent5: The optometrists' expertise was evident in their precise prescriptions.
